ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
6 Outdoor/Indoor Cameras: 3*SONY EXview HAD CCD II Cameras, 700 TV lines, 6~22mm varifocal lens, 72pcs IR LED, 196 ft IR Distance, WDR(Wide Dynamic Range), OSD Menu, Vandal proof & water proof; 3*SONY SUPER HAD CCD II Outdoor Cameras, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens,72 IR LEDs, OSD Menu, Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on), Metal vandal proof & water proof.
8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 2TB HDD: Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs. 960×480 & 30FPS Real Time Recording+ Real Time Playback. 2 USB Ports for Data Backup & Mouse Operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Realtime Recording+Playback, 6 Cameras Sony CCD 700 TVL 72 IR LEDs Vari-Focal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
